Aksi Heboh di Trailer Final 'Jumanji: The Next Level'
01 Nov 2019, 14:33 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Trailer final 'Jumanji: The Next Level' menawarkan aksi dan keseruan yang memang berbeda level dari dua pendahulunya. (dok. Sony Pictures Entertainment via YouTube)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Sony Pictures merilis trailer final film Jumanji: The Next Level. Pada trailer berdurasi tiga menit kurang ini terdapat banyak adegan baru yang menggambarkan cerita secara garis besar.Trailer dibuka dengan empat avatar gim Jumanji yang berada di gurun pasir. Mereka adalah Smolder Bravestone (Dwayne Johnson), Franklin Finbar (Kevin Hart), Ruby Roundhouse (Karen Gillan) dan Professor Sheldon Oberon (Jack Black).Kali ini Spencer (Alex Wolff), Martha (Morgan Turner), Fridge (Ser'Darius Blain) dan Bethany (Madison Iseman) tidak mendapatkan avatar yang sama seperti di Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle (2017). Gim konsol Jumanji rusak sehingga mereka tidak bisa memilih avatar.Martha, Fridge dan Bethany terpaksa memainkan Jumanji karena Spencer tersedot saat memperbaiki konsol gim tersebut. Bukan hanya mereka bertiga, kakek Spencer yang bernama Eddie (Danny DeVito), dan temannya, Milo (Danny Glover), juga ikut berpindah semesta.



Eddie mendapat avatar Smolder, Milo mendapat avatar Franklin, Fridge mendapat avatar Sheldon, Martha mendapat avatar Ruby dan Bethany mendapat karakter kuda. Kelemahan dan kekuatan masing-masing avatar berubah ketimbang sebelumnya.Pemandu gim Jumanji yang bernama Nigel (Rhys Darby) menjelaskan bahwa permainan kali ini lebih menantang dari sebelumnya. Bahkan tidak semua pemain bisa meninggalkan gim dalam kondisi hidup seperti sebelumnya.Penjelasan itu diiringi beberapa adegan laga yang menegangkan. Mulai dari berkelahi dengan banyak orang, sampai dikejar kawanan babun di suatu ngarai.Terlihat pula avatar Jefferson McDonough (Nick Jonas), meski belum diketahui siapa yang mendapat avatar tersebut. Selain Spencer, karakter yang bisa mendapat avatar tersebut adalah Alex (Colin Hanks), salah satu pemain di Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle.Di akhir cuplikan terlihat avatar yang didapat pemain berubah karena konsol gim masih rusak. Bethany ditampilkan kembali mendapatkan avatar Sheldon seperti dalam Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle.Jake Kasdan kembali menjadi sutradara Jumanji 3, pun begitu dengan penulis naskah Jeff Pinkner dan Scott Rosenberg. Jumanji: The Next Level dijadwalkan rilis pada pertengahan Desember 2019. (adp/rea)

Splashy Action in Final Trailer 'Jumanji: The Next Level'
01 Nov 2019, 14:33 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The final trailer 'Jumanji: The Next Level' offers action and excitement that are indeed different levels from the two predecessors. (doc. Sony Pictures Entertainment via YouTube)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Sony Pictures released the final trailer of the movie Jumanji: The Next Level. In this three-minute-less trailer there are many new scenes that outline the story. The trailer opens with four avatars of Jumanji in the desert. They are Smolder Bravestone (Dwayne Johnson), Franklin Finbar (Kevin Hart), Ruby Roundhouse (Karen Gillan) and Professor Sheldon Oberon (Jack Black). This time Spencer (Alex Wolff), Martha (Morgan Turner), Fridge (Ser'Darius Blain) and Bethany (Madison Iseman) do not get the same avatar as in Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle (2017). Jumanji's console game is broken so they can't choose an avatar. Martha, Fridge and Bethany are forced to play Jumanji because Spencer is sucked in when fixing the game console. Not only the three of them, Spencer's grandfather named Eddie (Danny DeVito), and his friend, Milo (Danny Glover), also joined the universe.



Eddie got the Smolder avatar, Milo got the Franklin avatar, Fridge got the Sheldon avatar, Martha got the Ruby avatar and Bethany got the horse character. Weaknesses and strengths of each avatar change than before. Game guide Jumanji named Nigel (Rhys Darby) explains that the game this time is more challenging than before. Not all players can even leave the game in the same condition as before. The explanation was accompanied by some tense action scenes. Starting from fighting with many people, to being chased by baboons in a canyon. Also see the avatar of Jefferson McDonough (Nick Jonas), although it is not yet known who got the avatar. In addition to Spencer, the character that can get the avatar is Alex (Colin Hanks), one of the players on Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle. At the end of the trailer you can see the avatar the player has changed because the game console is still broken. Bethany is shown returning to get the Sheldon avatar as in Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle. Jake Kasdan returned to become director of Jumanji 3, and so did scriptwriter Jeff Pinkner and Scott Rosenberg. Jumanji: The Next Level is scheduled for release in mid-December 2019. (adp / rea)
